speaker: Disha Agarwal
title: The AI Show: Ep 49 | Question Answering in General Availability
description:
Disha Agarwal joins Seth Juarez to talk about Question Answering! Disha will demo how to build a bot with Custom Question Answering and Prebuilt Question Answering! 

Tune in every Friday in February at 11 am PST for our 30 Days to Learn It: AI Fundamentals series and follow along https://aka.ms/AIShow/30DaystoLearn. 

Jump to:
00:00 AI Show begins
00:50 What is Question Answering and what problems is it solving
01:48 Custom Question Answering
03:43 Prebuilt v. Custom Question Answering
05:50 Unstructured doc v. semi-structured doc
07:46 Custom Demo
18:56 Prebuilt Demo
21:57 What's next in QA
